summary.span: O namespace fornece classes e interfaces compatíveis com consultas que usam LINQ (Consulta Integrada à Linguagem).

span.span: The namespace provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks O namespace está no assembly Core (em System.Core.dll).The namespace is in the System.Core assembly (in System.Core.dll). O classe contém [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] operadores de consulta padrão que operam em objetos que implementam .The class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement . O classe contém [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] operadores de consulta padrão que operam em objetos que implementam .The class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement . Para obter informações sobre o LINQ to SQL, consulte [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).For information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
